info.title: AudiMeta API
info.description: API to retrieve information about Book, Series and Search

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region to search in. Can be a comma separated list of max 3 regions. Defaults to US

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The asin of the series

parameters.name: cache
parameters.description: boolean. Defaults to true if not set. If false then a query will be made to Audible instead of the cache. For endpoints that return multiple books this will only ignore the search cache. For endpoints that return a single book this will ignore the book cache and re-fetch the book from source

regions.description: The regions the book is available in

explicit.description: The explicit content of the book

asin.description: The author asin. Can be the authors name!

region.description: The language of the authors description

image.description: The image of the author. 512x512 resolution

releaseDate.description: The release date of the book

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region to search in. Can be a comma separated list of max 3 regions. Defaults to US

parameters.name: asins
parameters.description: The asins of the book in a comma separated list

regions.description: The regions the book is available in

explicit.description: The explicit content of the book

asin.description: The author asin. Can be the authors name!

region.description: The language of the authors description

image.description: The image of the author. 512x512 resolution

releaseDate.description: The release date of the book

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: The author of the book. Needs to be provided if title is not provided

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the book. Needs to be provided if author is not provided

parameters.name: localTitle
parameters.description: Just like title this matches the title of the book. LocalTitle only searches in the database. This increases speed but needs a nearly exact match

parameters.name: localAuthor
parameters.description: Just like author this matches the author of the book. LocalAuthor only searches in the database. This increases speed but needs a nearly exact match

parameters.name: localNarrator
parameters.description: Just like narrator this matches the narrator of the book. LocalNarrator only searches in the database. This increases speed but needs a nearly exact match

parameters.name: localGenre
parameters.description: Just like genre this matches the genre of the book. LocalGenre only searches in the database. This increases speed but needs a nearly exact match

parameters.name: localSeries
parameters.description: Just like series this matches the series of the book. LocalSeries only searches in the database. This increases speed but needs a nearly exact match

parameters.name: localSeriesPosition
parameters.description: Just like series this matches the series of the book. LocalSeries only searches in the database. This increases speed but needs a nearly exact match

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region to search in. Can be a comma separated list of max 3 regions. Defaults to US

parameters.name: cache
parameters.description: boolean. Defaults to true if not set. If false then a query will be made to Audible instead of the cache. For endpoints that return multiple books this will only ignore the search cache. For endpoints that return a single book this will ignore the book cache and re-fetch the book from source

regions.description: The regions the book is available in

explicit.description: The explicit content of the book

asin.description: The author asin. Can be the authors name!

region.description: The language of the authors description

image.description: The image of the author. 512x512 resolution

releaseDate.description: The release date of the book

parameters.description: The asin of the series

get.summary: Get the chapters of a book

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region to search in. Can be a comma separated list of max 3 regions. Defaults to US

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The asin of the book

lengthMs.description: The length of the chapter in milliseconds

startOffsetMs.description: The start offset of the chapter in milliseconds

startOffsetSec.description: The start offset of the chapter in seconds

isAccurate.description: Whether the chapter information is accurate

runtimeLengthMs.description: The runtime length of the book in milliseconds

runtimeLengthSec.description: The runtime length of the book in seconds

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region to search in. Can be a comma separated list of max 3 regions. Defaults to US

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The asin of the author

asin.description: The author asin. Can be the authors name!

region.description: The language of the authors description

image.description: The image of the author. 512x512 resolution

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region to search in. Can be a comma separated list of max 3 regions. Defaults to US

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The asin of the author

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of books to return

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of the books to return
